nodes.text: Circumtore was a world located in the Hutt Space region of the galaxy. It was connected to fellow Hutt Space worlds Rorak, Nar Kaaga and Hollastin by hyperspace routes as well as Daalang outside of the region. Circumtore was located at galactic coordinates S-12.

Circumtore was first mentioned in the current canon in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a roleplaying game released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2016. The world originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it first appeared in the 1998 novel The Mandalorian Armor, which was written by K. W. Jeter.
